free.name: Black Knight's Fortress
free.summary: The black knights are up to no good. You are hired by the white knights to spy on them and uncover their evil scheme.

free.name: Cook's Assistant
free.summary: The lumbridge castle cook is in a mess. It is the duke of Lumbridge's birthday and the cook is making the cake. He needs a lot of ingredients and doesn't have much time.

free.name: Demon Slayer
free.summary: A mighty demon is being summoned to destroy the city of Varrock. You find out you are the one destined to stop him.(or at least to try)
free.requirements: Able to defeat an apocalyptic demon

free.name: Doric's Quest
free.summary: Doric the dwarf is happy to let you use his anvils but first he would like you to run an errand for him.

free.name: The Restless Ghost
free.summary: A ghost is haunting Lumbridge graveyard. The priest of the Lumbridge church of Saradomin wants you to find out how to get rid of it.

free.name: Goblin Diplomacy
free.summary: There's a disturbance in the goblin village. Help the goblins solve their dispute so the world doesn't have to worry about rioting goblins.

free.name: Ernest the Chicken
free.summary: Veronica is very worried. Her fiancee went into the big spooky manor house to ask for directions. An hour later and he's still not out yet.

free.name: Imp Catcher
free.summary: The Wizard Grayzag has summoned hundreds of little imps. They have stolen a lot of things belonging to the Wizard Mizgog including his magic beads.

free.name: Pirate's Treasure
free.summary: Redbeard Frank knows where secret pirate treasure is hidden, it may require some work to persuade him to let you know where though.

free.name: Prince Ali Rescue
free.summary: Prince Ali of Al Kharid has been kidnapped by the scheming Lady Keli. You are hired to stage a rescue mission.

free.name: Romeo & Juliet
free.summary: Romeo & Juliet are desperately in love, but Juliet's father doesn't approve. Help them to find a way to get married and live happily ever after.

free.name: Sheep Shearer
free.summary: Farmer Fred's sheep are getting mighty woolly. He will pay you to shear them.

free.name: Shield of Arrav
free.summary: Varrocian literature tells of a valuable shield stolen from long ago the museum of Varrock by a gang of professional thieves. See if you can track down this shield and return it to the museum. You will need a friend to help you complete this quest.

free.name: The Knight's Sword
free.requirements:
Mining level 10
Must not be afraid of lvl 68 Ice Giant
free.summary: Sir Vyvin's squire is in trouble. He has lost Sir Vyvin's ceremonial sword. Help him find a replacement without Sir Vyvin finding out.

free.name: Vampire Slayer
free.summary: The people of Draynor village live in constant terror. Their numbers are dwindling, all due to the foul creature lurking in the manor to the north known as a vampire.

free.name: Witch's Potion
free.summary: Become one with your darker side. Tap into your hidden depths of magical potential by making a potion with the help of Hetty the Rimmington witch.

free.name: Dragon Slayer
free.requirements:
Be a member of the champions guild
Level 33 magic
Be able to kill a lvl 110 dragon
free.summary: Prove yourself a true hero. Kill the mighty dragon Elvarg of Crandor Island and earn the right to buy and wear the powerful rune plate mail body.

members.name: Witch's House
members.requirements: Must kill a mystery lvl-54 monster
members.summary: A young boy who lives in Taverley has kicked his ball into the garden of a scary old lady. He asks you to get it back for him. This proves more difficult than it first sounds.

members.name: Hero's Quest
members.requirements:
55 quest points
Level 25 herblaw
Level 50 mining
Level 53 fishing
Level 53 cooking
members.summary: Prove you are worthy to enter the hero's guild. To prove your status as a hero you will need to obtain a number of items. There are many challenges standing between you and these items.

members.name: Merlin's Crystal
members.summary: Merlin the wizard has carelessly become imprisoned inside a giant crystal. Take up king Arthur's quest to free Merlin and become one of the knights of the round table.

members.name: Family Crest
members.requirements:
lvl 40 Mining
Level 40 Smithing
Level 40 Crafting
Level 59 Magic
Defeat a lvl 121 Demon
members.summary: The Fitzharmon family crest has gone missing, and the family honour has been lost. Can you find the crest and return it to Dimintheis in Varrock? There are 3 different rewards available, but you can only choose one, so choose carefully!

members.name: Fishing Contest
members.start: The foot of White Wolf mountain
members.summary: The mountain Dwarves home would be an ideal way to get across White Wolf mountain safely. However the Dwarves aren't to fond of strangers. They will let you through if you can bring them a trophy. The trophy is the prize for the annual Hemenster fishing competition.

members.name: Temple of Ikov
members.summary: A mysterious stranger called Lucien asks you to go on a mission deep under the Temple of Ikov in central Kandarin. He wants you to retrieve an artifact known as the Staff of Armadyl. Towards the end of the quest you are presented with a choice on how to complete the quest.

members.name: The Holy Grail
members.requirements:
Must have completed Merlin's crystal
Must defeat a lvl-146 black knight titan
members.summary: King arthur is sending out his knights on a quest for the famous holy grail. If you are a knight of the round table go to king arthur for further orders.

members.name: Tree Gnome Village
members.summary: The tree gnomes are in trouble. General Khazard's forces are hunting them to extinction. Find you way through the hedge maze to the gnomes secret treetop village. Then help the gnomes fight Khazard and retrieve the orbs of protection.

members.name: Sheep Herder
members.summary: Some plague infected sheep have escaped into East Ardounge. They must be found and disposed off before the whole town is infected, time is of the essence.

members.name: Sea Slug
members.summary: Something strange is happening on the fishing platform. Missing fishermen and the presence of dozens of strange sea creatures gives cause for concern. Investigate the platform, discover the truth before it's too late.

members.name: Biohazard
members.summary: Second part of an ongoing adventure. Help Elena discover the truth about the infamous ardounge plague. Smuggle test samples across ardounge to Elena's old mentor.

members.name: The Grand Tree
members.requirements:
Agility 25
Able to Defeat a Level 175 Demon
members.summary: The Grand Tree, which shelters the majority of RuneScape's small gnome population, is dying. Is it human sabotage or an inside job? Help King Shareem to find the true cause and save the tree gnomes from an uncertain fate.

members.name: Underground Pass
members.requirements:
Level 25 Ranged
Must beat level 98 demon, and two level 78 demons
Must have completed Biohazard Quest
Good thieving and agility is an advantage
members.summary:
The Underground Pass, sealed for thousands of years, has now been reopened to reveal a complex labyrinth of tunnels and chasms. You must find a way through, and get one step closer to the evil King Tyras. But the road is long and it could be lonely. When fatigue starts to take it's toll, mental strength is what you'll need...

The Underground Pass is the third part of our ongoing Members' Quest

members.name: The Tourist Trap
members.start: The Shantay Pass south of Al Kharid
members.npc: Shantay or one of his assistants and anyone else you find there
members.summary:
South of Al Kharid a new Desert Pass has opened up, leading to the dangers of the Kharid desert.

Don your desert garb and make sure your waterskin is full before heading off into the trackless dunes in search of desert adventure.

members.name: Dwarf Cannon
members.start: Coal Trucks West of McGrubbs Wood
members.summary: For several years now the dwarven black guard have been developing the lastest in projectile warfare. Now with the constant attack of goblin renegades, the dwarven troops who protect the mines need to put this secret weapon into action. Only with your help can the true power of this cannon be harnessed!

members.name: Digsite Quest
members.start: Archaeological digsite, signposted east of Varrock
members.requirements:
Level 25 Thieving
Level 10 Agility
Level 10 Herblaw
members.summary:
Feeling uneducated? Desperate for buried treasure?
..."There's gold in them there hills" (well stream actually) as well as many other items that can be found at the digsite.

Join the students in their attempt to be a qualified archaeologist, and become experienced in making the earth move!

Have you got what it takes to unearth the hidden altar to one of Runescape's lesser-known Gods...?

members.name: Legends Quest
members.start: Legends Guild Main gates - west of the Barbarian outpost
members.requirements:
Quest Points and must have completed these quests:
Hero's Quest
Family Crest Quest
Underground Pass Quest
Waterfall Quest
Shilo Village Quest
Skill requirements:
Level 52 Mining
Level 50 Agility
Level 50 Crafting
Level 50 Smithing
Level 50 Strength
Level 50 Thieving
Level 50 Woodcutting
Level 45 Herblaw
Level 42 Prayer
members.summary: Accept the challenge of the Legends Guild to map the Southern part of Karamja Island, make friends with the natives and bring back a prize to display in the Legends Guild Main Hall.

members.name: Lost City
members.requirements:
Level 31 Crafting
Level 36 woodcutting
Must kill a level 95 spirit unarmed
members.summary: Legends tell of a magical lost city hidden in the swamps. Many adventurers have tried to find this city, but it is proving difficult. Can you unlock the secrets of the city of Zanaris?

members.name: Druidic Ritual
members.summary: To start using the herblaw skill you will need to ask for some training from the druids. However they require some help with a ritual before they will help you.

members.name: Scorpion Catcher
members.requirements:
level 31 prayer
Go deep into the members dungeon
members.summary: Thormac has lost his rare lesser kharid scorpions after leaving their cage door open. These scorpions have hidden in areas that are rather difficult to get into. You will have to overcome various challenges (and drink a lot of beer) to get all the scorpions back If you manage to help him Thormac will improve your battle staffs.

members.name: Tribal Totem
members.summary: Lord Handelmort of Ardougne is collector of exotic artifacts. A recent addition to his private collection is a strange looking totem from Karamja. The Rantuki tribe are not happy about the recent disaperance of their totem.

members.name: Monk's Friend
members.summary: A monk's child has had their blanket stolen. Find the thieves' den and return the blanket, then help Brother Omad organise the drinks for the child's birthday party.

members.name: Clock Tower
members.summary: Help the confused Brother Kojo find the missing cogs and fix his watch tower. Search the dungeon using brawn and brains to correctly place the four cogs.

members.name: Fight Arena
members.summary: The prosperous Servil family have been abducted by the infamous General Khazard. He plans to have the family battle for his entertainment in the fight arena. Can you rescue the Servil's before the tyrant has these innocent (not to mention wealthy) civillians slain.

members.name: The Hazeel Cult
members.summary: Discover the truth behind the Carnillean family fortune. Decide for yourself wheather to aid the Carnilleans in retrieving stolen goods, or join the hazeel cult members in their mission to resurrect the infamous Lord Hazeel.

members.name: Plague City
members.summary:
Epsiode 1 of our multipart quest.
A shadow of disease has overcast Ardounge. Edmond's daugher Elena has gone missing in West Ardougne whilst trying to help the plague victims there. See if you can find out what's going on.

members.name: Waterfall Quest
members.summary: Investigate the death of elven leaders of old. Search for the elf king baxtorian's tomb and discover the mysterious hidden treasure of the waterfall.

members.name: Jungle Potion
members.summary: Trufitus Shakaya of the Taie Bwo Wannai Village requires that you collect five special jungle herbs for a potion so he can commune with his Gods.

members.name: Shilo Village Quest
members.requirements:
Level 32 Agility
Level 20 Crafting
Must fight a Level 80+ Monster
Must have completed Jungle Potion Quest
members.summary: New areas in the Southern part of Karamja Island have been discovered with a mysterious village. Who knows what hidden treasures exist, and what dangers lurk to guard them?

members.name: Observatory Quest
members.start: Observatory reception, South West of Ardougne
members.requirements:
Level 10 Crafting
Able to kill a level 48 guard
members.summary:
The observatory in South West Ardougne has been ransacked by a family of nearby goblins. Can you help the professors to rebuild it?

Use your skills at crafting to make the various parts, and fight your way through the cavern under the observatory. Use the telescope and the stars hold a secret for you.

members.name: Watch Tower
members.start: Watch Tower close to city gates of Yanille
members.requirements:
Level 14 Herblaw, Level 14 Magic
Level 15 Thieving
Level 30 Agility
Level 40 Mining
Must defeat Level 80+ monsters
members.summary: The Wizards of the Yanille Watch Tower have been reporting increased ogre sightings recently. Use a wide variety of your skills to help the wizards recover their stolen power crystals and stop the advance of the ogre hordes!

members.name: Murder Mystery
members.start: Sinclair's Mansion, North of Seers Tower
members.npc: Any of the Guards on the Property
members.requirements: The keen mind of a detective
members.summary:
Lord Sinclair, a highly respected Nobleman of Kandarin has been found murdered in his mansion. Despite the presence of a large number of guards all working hard to solve the crime, local law enforcement officers are totally baffled.

Can you use your razor sharp analytical mind to uncover the evidence and unmask the culprit?

members.name: Gertrude's Cat
members.start: Gertrude's House, just opposite Juliet's place on the outskirts of Varrock
members.summary:
Gertrude's cat has been missing for some time now - for her piece of mind her prized pet must be rescued.

Handling cats isn't an easy business. They get hungry and need plenty of attention but if you're the pet type, then this is the quest for you!
